title: Display driver crash often after 3 min' into the game.

replies.body:
These crashes can be caused by a number of different reasons, however, a few common causes are improperly installed drivers or poor windows power settings. I'd recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure the common solutions have been addressed before we investigate further.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.

I understand that the Guide is specifically called *FPS* but it covers solutions for anything display related. I'd like you to give them a go, because if they don't work, it's very likely your Graphics Card is experiencing premature failure.
